title: Spotify XAI form 2

body.question: Someone once told me (probably some comedian) that rapid changes in hair color was “the white woman’s call for help,” that’s stuck with me for a while now, especially after dating someone who fit that to a T. Think it’s probably somewhat applicable to all genders/races though lol, but mainly just somewhat hilarious as a joke.
How clear/meaningful do you think this explanation is?
What is the popularity of the song 'I'm Yours' by Jason Mraz?
Which of the following features do you think contributed the most to the AI's prediction?
